title: Night
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Hodaka Yoshida / 1954]; LLC, in p
description: abstract image: deep purple background with trail of vertical lavender colored \"dumbbell\" figures ascending from LLC to upper quadrant; a few horizontal cream colored \"dumbbell\" shaped figures bisect some of the lavender figures; light blue, dark blue, and some maroon colored circles and squares in background, some of the light blue shapes also begin at LL and ascend into top quadrant
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
